channel.title: ~Revolutionize~ [Update 13]
channel.description:
~Revolutionize~ [size=18pt]Reason for topic/ What this source is abought[/size]
[font=impact]Well To start off arnt You guys tired of Browsing Though the server download section and only coming to find Horibal Delta's or The same old PI. Well i am and thats why i starter this project Basicly im going to take a framework And code that from there coding the esentials for a good Runscape private server.[/font]
Ive Programmed Java for over 2 years now and have just recently started on runescape private servers and this will be my First official project. At the moment my current goals are to Create fully working skills Atleast the Main ones and Create an Incredebly Stable Base
[size=18pt]Update log.[/size] [code]Added An action button Class To handle well Action buttons! 26/11/10[/code]
[font=courier]Goals[/font] Green is Complete Currently Working on Havent Started yet
Adding PVN Support [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/6900/avi0003.gif[/img]
Adding PVP Support Adding Food/Potion Support
[font=arial black]Positions Need[/font] [font=impact]Server Programmer (someone with decent abilites) Client Programmer(agian Decent Skills need)[/font]
[font=georgia]No Need for pictures as atm its just a blank source But heres one anyway.[/font] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/25sohs7.png[/img]
Edit:i Have decided to youse Runesource as my base as it has shown to be Incredibaly Stable Holding Up To 1000 Bots Also I did not take these pictures [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/24y9s47.png[/img] [font=trebuchet ms]Application Format[/font]
[font=comic sans ms]Name: Age: Coding Expierince: Position: Proof: Msn:[/font]

When did Runesource be released…? And I can understand that mate. I hope this isn’t like the rest in the end. I hope this means also not adding customs?
[/quote]
it wasent released i just downloaded of his SVN Page and yes no customs
1 More thing What do You think i should use as client Galkons?[/quote]
Yes, I would think so.

item.title: ~Revolutionize~ [Update 13]
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

conner_:

Do you plan on just making it a project or do you want to release it and maintain it online?

Well I plan on maintaining it online for as long as i can to try to get as much of the things i need done and yes i do plan on releasing it 100% open source. Really what this project is is to try to Get people of Delta and other Overused Sources

Read full topic
